COM.sootNsmoke.scheme
Class Numbers

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--COM.sootNsmoke.scheme.Numbers
public class Numbers
extends java.lang.Object

A collection of static methods which perform basic arithmetic on Numbers despite Java's library giving us no help. This means that the code in here involves a lot of tedious checking for type. This is the hierarchy: Complex Real (Double or Float) Rational Integer (Long or Integer) Both numbers are cast to the highest level of either, and the result is of that type. Just so this doesn't take absolutely FOREVER, there is a special case at the beginning to handle two ints or floats. (It's still way too slow for a real system, but I can't do better without a radical change to the way numbers are stored)
